messages.m: Have you tested WebPageTest? It's another super cool Open Source tool created by Patrick Meenan.
Do you want to know more about web performance? Checkout the hash tags #webperf and #perfmatters on Twitter.
Have you read Steve Souders blog post about how to measure the load time of your hero image?
Stefan Judis & Marco Biedermann runs Perf Tooling Today - a collection of resources which will help you to improve your workflow and to deliver better and faster websites.
Read the story how sitespeed.io was built.
Want to continously test your site? Test the Open Source Web Performance Dashboard.
Want to know more about how to foster a culture around web performance in organizations? Checkout Katie Kovalcin and Tim Kadlec podcast Path To Performance
Do you know that Andy Davies was the only in the world who scored 100% in a SpeedGeek challenge? You better follow him on Twitter!
Woman Who Code is a non-profit dedicated to inspiring women to excel in technology careers. You could and should support them!
Ilya Grigorik is a web performance engineer and developer advocate at Google and you should follow him on Github and Twitter becasue knows alot about web performance!
Steve Souders is the Godfather of web performance. Make sure you check out his blog!
Wesley Hales created <a href='http://speedgun.io' target='_blank'>, another cool Open Source web performance tool.
Wesley Hales created <a href='http://speedgun.io' target='_blank'>, another cool Open Source web performance tool.
Read the excellent posts by Tim Kadlec about Setting a performance budget and Fast enough.
